params.data: Additional factory-specific data required for token creation.
params.decimals: The number of decimal places for the token.
params.graffiti: Additional data to be included in the token's salt
params.initialSupply: The initial supply to mint upon creation.
params.name: The ERC20-style name of the token.
params.recipient: The recipient of the initial supply.
params.symbol: The ERC20-style symbol of the token.

returns.tokenAddress: The address of the newly created token.
